description: Returns information about product integrations in Security Hub. You can optionally provide an integration ARN. If you provide an integration ARN, then the results only include that integration. If you don't provide an integration ARN, then the results include all of the available product integrations.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The token that is required for pagination. On your first call to the DescribeProducts operation, set the value of this parameter to NULL. For subsequent calls to the operation, to continue listing data, set the value of this parameter to the value returned from the previous response.

nested_items.name: Products
nested_items.description: A list of products, including details for each product.

nested_items.name: ProductArn
nested_items.description: The ARN assigned to the product.

nested_items.name: CompanyName
nested_items.description: The name of the company that provides the product.

nested_items.name: Categories
nested_items.description: The categories assigned to the product.

nested_items.name: IntegrationTypes
nested_items.description: The types of integration that the product supports. Available values are the following.
SEND_FINDINGS_TO_SECURITY_HUB - The integration sends findings to Security Hub.
RECEIVE_FINDINGS_FROM_SECURITY_HUB - The integration receives findings from Security Hub.
UPDATE_FINDINGS_IN_SECURITY_HUB - The integration does not send new findings to Security Hub, but does make updates to the findings that it receives from Security Hub.

nested_items.name: MarketplaceUrl
nested_items.description: For integrations with Amazon Web Services services, the Amazon Web Services Console URL from which to activate the service.

nested_items.name: ActivationUrl
nested_items.description: The URL to the service or product documentation about the integration with Security Hub, including how to activate the integration.

nested_items.name: ProductSubscriptionResourcePolicy
nested_items.description: The resource policy associated with the product.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token to use to request the next page of results.
